instructions.name: initializePool
docs: Initializes a new pool

instructions.name: createUser
docs: Initialize a user staking account

instructions.name: pause
docs: Pauses the pool && refund reward

instructions.name: unpause
docs: Unpauses a previously paused pool, taking a xSTEP deposit again and
allowing for funding

instructions.name: stake
docs: A user stakes tokens in the pool.

instructions.name: unstake
docs: A user unstakes tokens in the pool.

instructions.name: fund
docs: Fund the pool with rewards.  This resets the clock on the end date, pushing it out to the set duration
And linearly redistributes remaining rewards.

instructions.name: claim
docs: A user claiming rewards

instructions.name: updatePoolDuration
docs: update start_time, reward_end_time

instructions.name: withdrawUnuseReward
docs: withdraw unuse reward

instructions.name: closeUser
docs: Closes a users stake account. Validation is done to ensure this is only allowed when
the user has nothing staked and no rewards pending.

instructions.name: closePool
docs: Closes a pool account. Only able to be done when there are no users staked.

instructions.name: createMintTokenBonusConfig
docs: Create sBot token config

instructions.name: getAuthorityMintTokenBonus
docs: Get mint authority of sBot token

instructions.name: closeTokenBonusConfig
docs: Close token
